```{r}
library(bigsnpr)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
G3 = snp_attach("LTFH.rds")
```

```{r}
# Get information
G = G3$genotypes
MAF = G3$map$MAF
#l = G3$fam$l
#l_g = G3$fam$l_g
#y = G3$fam$y

l_g = G3$fam$l_g
l_e = G3$fam$l_e
l_g1 = G3$fam$l_g1
l_e1 = G3$fam$l_e1
l_g2 = G3$fam$l_g2
l_e2 = G3$fam$l_e2
```


```{r}
# Check if mean of G is correct
G_mean = colMeans(G[,])
MAF_mean = MAF*2

all.equal.numeric(G_mean, MAF_mean, tolerance= .Machine$double.eps ^ 0.5, scale=NULL)
G_mean[1:10]
MAF_mean[1:10]

```

```{r}
# Check distribution of liability (standard normal)
l = l_g + l_e 
qqnorm(l)
mean(l)
var(l)
```

```{r}
# Check distribution of liability (standard normal)
l1 = l_g1 + l_e1 
qqnorm(l1)
mean(l1)
var(l1)
```
